channel.title: shaderapidx9.dll....
channel.description: Ok, now this is making me crazy....i get some kind of weird error when i want to start HL2 Episode 1 or HL2 Episode 2. Steam tries to start the game and i get the message from windows that the application has crashed and the reason seems to be "shaderapidx9.dll". This has never happened to me, i didnt changed my system or drivers, so what is causing this error all of a sudden? Ive googled through the net and people seem to have this same error, but i couldnt fix it so far! It only happens to Episode 1 and 2, it doesnt occur when i want to start Half Life 2! Any ideas how to fix this?

item.title: shaderapidx9.dll....
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Re-installing works 90% of the time. Also verify the integrity of your game files. I don’t know what it does, but it sounds like it might help.

Read full topic

item.title: shaderapidx9.dll....
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Have you tried de-frag the caches, perhaps its missing, maybe a re-install.

Read full topic

item.title: shaderapidx9.dll....
item.dc:creator: Xenomorphlover
item.description:
Ok, now this is making me crazy…i get some kind of weird error when i want to
start HL2 Episode 1 or HL2 Episode 2. Steam tries to start the game and i get the message from windows that the application has crashed and the reason seems
to be “shaderapidx9.dll”. This has never happened to me, i didnt changed my system or drivers, so what is causing this error all of a sudden? Ive googled through the net and people seem to have this same error, but i couldnt fix it so far!
It only happens to Episode 1 and 2, it doesnt occur when i want to start Half Life 2!
Any ideas how to fix this?
